comment: One of the best math teachers I have had in a long time. Even though it was her first time teaching precalc, she was very knowledgable of the material and extremely helpful. She was very understanding and, overall, a very nice person. I strongly recommend her to everyone, even if you do not like math. I did not buy a book for this class, just MML.
She is a great teacher. take her!

She is an amazing teacher! She is extremely helpful and is open to e-mails anytime. You do not have to buy the textbook but you do have to buy a subscription to mymathlab. She also allows the use of calculators. I would absolutely recommend her.
Fun and not too difficult. show up and apply yourself and an A shouldnt be a problem.

Very good professor but not the easiest class. Very time consuming but you really get alot out of the class. You basically get what you put in, so if you work hard you shouldn't have a problem. Recommend Dr Ledford she's funny and sooo nice.
Dr. Ledford is a very nice, helpful, and fun. Take her for your math 3495.....

Only the best.  I am an average student and with her help I got an "A" in her class. Had to use a TI89 to do it but she is absolutley the best!   Take this lady you wont regret it.  She GOOD looking too!

I loved this teacher...she made everything fun and interesting, she can tell when you're just not interested anymore and will usually let you go once you've had enough, I don't know if she's coming back because at the end of summer semester, she was so pregnant she looked like she might pop during our final. But if you can take it, definitely do.
She is incredible. I hate math and she made me love it! Wish I could have her for all of my math classes!

Loved Ledford, will take her again. Quizzes were always an easy 100.. If you study for tests you will do well. Do homework, show up for class, make an effort and you'll get an A. Tests are pretty easy if you do your homework. Very helpful in class and out of class. She's young so she still remembers what college was like! I HIGHLY recommend her.

She was a good teacher. She starts off the semester suggesting to attend class and i didnt listen...i went on tests and still passed the class but could've made an A if I'd gone for the quizes and homework. Big part of grade.

She is a great teacher. She tries her best to give you a good grade. Quizzes def. help a lot so show up for class b/c some are pop quizzes. She tries to communicate and help out students as much as possible! GREAT TEACHER!

She was a great teacher, very funny and nice. Her tests are examples from the homework. Show up for class for pop quizzes which in the end will turn into a test grade added up. She is very EASY on quizes. She gives the answers to you hintingly while taking the class. An easy B if you try.

Wonderful teacher. She takes the time to get to know you as a student, and really makes an effort (and succeeds) at connecting with the class. her tests are fair, and fairly straightforward and easy. she's always willing to help as well. i'd take her again!

Mrs. Ledford was a great teacher, she always stopped to answer questions... even the stupid ones, and she was always willing to work with you. She does not have an attendance policy, but her class flies by. I encourage you to take this course!
She was extremely enthusiastic about seeing her students doing well. The tests generally came straight from the homework.
